content:
The chunk appears at the conclusion of a document discussing multi-pass rendering techniques in Panda3D, specifically addressing how to achieve different render states and camera views within a single frame. It serves as a reference point for readers seeking more comprehensive guidance on the subject.

**Context:** The chunk is found at the end of a section explaining various methods for implementing multi-pass rendering in Panda3D, including setting up cameras, using initial states, and applying tags for different render effects.

For a full guide about Multi-Pass rendering in Panda3D, please read the Howto on Multipass Rendering of the original Panda3D documentation.
